DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To evaluate whether additional relaxation technique effective reduction chronic neck pain compare usual care alone . Study design : Open single-centered randomize two-armed pragmatic trial . Participants : 220 patient age 18-65 year chronic ( > 12 week ) neck pain mean pain score ≥ 4 Numeric Rating scale ( NRS ) last week randomization randomly allocate two group ( relaxation , usual care alone wait list ) Intervention : Participants apply either daily 15-minute relaxation exercise guide smartphone application ( `` app '' ) . apply additional intervention . The exercise apply daily , ( minimally , five day per week ) 6 month . The app contain audio guide autogenic training , muscle relaxation training guide imagery . On daily basis , participant select one three exercise want apply . Main outcome measure : The primary outcome mean pain intensity 3 month measure daily pain intensity NRS .
